titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the assizes held at Lincoln, March the 6th, 1691/2 before the right honourale [sic] Sir John Holt, Kt., lord chief justice of England / by Walter Leightonhouse ... ; printed at the earnest request of the gentlemen of the country.
titleStmt.author: Leightonhouse, Walter, 1656-1701.

notesStmt.note: Half-title: A sermon preached at the Lincoln assizes, March the 6th, 1691/2.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
